text:
Activity 1: Energy Sticks

  • Experiment with an energy stick to learn how to activate it.

Challenge: Try to find three distinct ways to activate the energy stick.

  1. Use more than one person.
  2. Use an object and people.
  3. Use no people at all. Can you find the limit of the number of people that can activate the energy stick?
  4. Can you find the limit of the number of people that can activate the energy stick? How did the energy stick behave as more people were added?
